text: Uğur Yücel (born 26 May 1957) is a Turkish actor, director, producer and screenwriter. Uğur Yücel was born in Istanbul. He graduated from Istanbul Municipality Conservatory Department of Theatre. He worked in private theatres between 1975 and 1984. His first movie role is in Aşık Oldum (1985). He is married with actress Derya Alabora and has a son. ==Other websites== * * Uğur Yücel at SinemaTurk Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Istanbul Category:Turkish movie producers Category:Turkish movie actors Category:Turkish movie directors Category:Turkish screenwriters Category:Turkish television actors
title: Uğur Yücel
